scripts.production_upload: gcloud functions deploy heliumlft-upload --trigger-topic heliumlft-upload --entry-point heliumlft_upload --stage-bucket vo-fx
scripts.production_upload_message_1: gcloud alpha pubsub topics publish heliumlft-upload --message='1,1,2,hello '
scripts.production_upload_message_2: gcloud alpha pubsub topics publish heliumlft-upload --message='1,2,2,world'
scripts.production_assemble: gcloud functions deploy heliumlft-assemble --trigger-topic heliumlft-assemble --entry-point heliumlft_assemble --stage-bucket vo-fx
scripts.production_assemble_message: gcloud alpha pubsub topics publish heliumlft-assemble --message='1'
